mapper.select: SELECT * FROM returns ORDER BY return_id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO returns (return_id, user_id, address ,order_no, product_id, type, size, quantity, order_date, reason, contents, c_size) VALUE (#{return_id}, #{user_id}, #{address} ,#{order_no}, #{product_id}, #{type}, #{size}, #{quantity}, #{order_date}, #{reason}, #{contents}, #{c_size})
mapper.select: SELECT return_id FROM returns WHERE return_id LIKE CONCAT(#{return_id}, '%') ORDER BY return_id DESC LIMIT 1
